name: AudioRush
description:
Informations:

  • This game creates levels procedurally from any mp3, wav or ogg file.
  • If you play the song for the first time it can take up to 15 seconds to completly load the data. Depends on the file size.
  • If you enable the "save audio data" option, it'll create a binary file which makes loading much faster if you play the same song again. It'll also save a binary file for the score. (C:\Users\<user>\AppData\LocalLow\Buttermilch\AudioRush)
  • There are currently 3 difficutly settings:  easy, normal and hard. 
  • There is currently only one game mode. You have to avoid the dark blocks and hit the colored ones.

Controls:

  • ESC - Pauses and unpauses the game
  • Left arrow / A - Move left
  • Right arrow / D - Move right
  • Notice that you'll snap back to the mid when you don't press the left or right buttons.

Gameplay:

  • Left number stands for the hits you've made in a row
  • Middle number is your score.
  • Right number is a multiplier in percent which increases your score.

I'd be very happy about some feedback! :)

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_Buttermilch
